description: Connected numbers (A029827) with binary order n, i.e. those in interval [ 2(n-1)+1,2^n ].
example: From the 64 numbers of which the binary order is 7, the following 8 are composite connected numbers: 85,95,99,111,115,117,119,123. Among the others 13 primes, 4 true prime powers and 39 split numbers can be found.
author: _Labos Elemer_
